price: 75. Nous le reçûmes dans Notre miséricorde, lui qui était du nombre des vertueux.
arabic: وَأَدۡخَلۡنَٰهُ فِي رَحۡمَتِنَآۖ إِنَّهُۥ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-adkhalnāhu fī raḥmatinā innahu mina al-ṣāliḥīna
